data.title: Village of the Damned (DVD)(1995)
data.meta_description: Shop Village of the Damned (DVD)(1995) at Target. Choose from Same Day Delivery, Drive Up or Order Pickup. Free standard shipping with $35 orders.
data.text: Christopher Reeve, Kirstie Alley. A doctor, a scientist and a schoolteacher team up to battle a murderous group of superintelligent children. A riveting remake of the 1960 sci-fi classic. Directed by John Carpenter. 1995/color/99 min/R/widescreen.
